titleInfo.title: Wally Fowler at the Gospel and Spiritual All-Nite Singing at the Decatur High School March 5

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue on split fountain, yellow to blue) Hatch poster announcing Wally Fowler's Gospel and Spiritual All-nite Singing with the Johnson Sisters, Wally Fowler, Statesman Quartet, Gospelaires Quartet, and the Harmoneers at the Decatur High School Auditorium on March 5.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
